pullrequest.title: Fixes for installer to run with Python 3

content.raw:
Thanks!

Rather than aliasing `raw_input = input` on Python 3, I think better form would be to simply replace the sole use of `raw_input()` in `yn_choice()` with a call to `input()` instead. That way we're using Python 3 syntax and only doing the aliasing in Python 2.

Good catch on the icon cache thingy. How annoying!
